sect1.title: General
sect1.para: Purpose of ZenturHSM: The ZenturHSM integration component uses the ZenturHSM.c file and the corresponding header file in order to provide the startup routine for HSM and implements the UDS diagnostic service 0x2E for loading the SHE keys, VKMS initial key into HSM memory and service 0x22 for reading the key written status. DID 0xEFF2 is used for VKMS IS key and 0xEFC5 is used to SHE keys.
